content.text:
# 1904 Illawarra state by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Illawarra on 9 January 1904 because of the death of Archibald Campbell ().
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 14 December 1903
| Archibald Campbell died.
|-
|19 December 1903
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 31 December 1903
| Nominations
|-
| 9 January 1904
| Polling day
|-
| 25 January 1904
| Return of writ
|}
Result
}}
Archibald Campbell () died.
